frontmatter.description: React Boston is a two-day, single-track conference on React hosted in Boston's Back Bay neighborhood and organized in collaboration with Wayfair Tech and the community ReactJS Boston Meetup. We're excited to welcome developers of all backgrounds, skill sets, and experience levels to join us for a weekend of high-quality content and great conversations with others in the developer community. Watch the tech talks from React Boston 2018 here!
frontmatter.title: React Boston 2018
